topic.title: Un-deleted.  Buy the dip for what, a song for stock twits.
topic.body:
Got removed from yt for copyright.. but should fall under creative commons..

Been looking for it for a while..

https://pixeldrain.com/u/8umYhGTm

https://ipfs.io/ipfs/QmYtMVCi6f6vwqtifWJ1xipBEFxVJ18U91fX5p2EMtxN88?filename=Buy%20the%20Dip%20for%20What!%20(A%20Song%20for%20StockTwits).mp4

Buy the dip for what, a song for stock twits.

topic.title: How to post on 4chan?
topic.body:
VPNs all seem blocked. Searching for instructions says use a VPN.

My residential and mobile isp is blocked

Only way to post now is to pay?

1587761800_1NG5ezregpGPUFoJuJfVZLW98B2ze.body:
Outernet (project lantern) 

https://www.teachthought.com/technology/outernet-lantern-one-device-free-data-from-space-forever/

Low bandwidth device that gets a little bit of stuff every day.  There is a discussion board on what things people think is important to be brodcast.



Freedom Box

https://freedombox.org/#features

A Linux distro with some useful apps runs on rPi or wherever you like.

1588088871_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRF.body:
Was thinking similar.
I'd just like to cut the stuff out at the start and end anyway.  Only have so much time, don't need to waste it with the same thing.

We have so many duplicates of things, but those duplicates aren't readily available to others. drive space wasted.  Could be much more efficient.  IPFS or something like it could help move things in the right direction.

1587679731_1367VTupfj886Uk39iT4RjiSmraki.body:
A cache of nearly 25,000 email addresses and passwords allegedly belonging to the World Health Organization (WHO), National Institutes of Health (NIH), Wuhan Institute of Virology, Bill Gates Foundation and several other groups involved with the coronavirus pandemic response were dumped on 4chan before appearing on several other websites, according to the SITE Intelligence Group.

https://www.zerohedge.com/health/email-addresses-and-passwords-who-nih-wuhan-lab-and-gates-foundation-dumped-4chan

Anons know what to do..

They have been hacked and exposed

Make this go Viral

W.H.O

 https://pastebin.com/UpNjLRaS 

World Bank.

 https://pastebin.com/vR9ivmhc 

Wuhan Institute of Virology

 https://archive.is/UtQGz 

CDC

 https://archive.is/lyApN 

NIH

 https://archive.is/WkHpk 

Gates Foundation

 https://pastebin.com/awqUq72B 

 https://archive.is/j6sgo 

WHO

 https://pastebin.com/raw/UpNjLRaS 

 https://archive.is/JIJ2b 

Wuhan Institute of Virology

 https://pastebin.com/PfWKgJgJ 

 https://archive.is/2RjgI 

You can follow @17Karnage.

https://threader.app/thread/1252491051891191820

Mike Coudrey

@MichaelCoudrey

BREAKING: It is being reported that the Gates Foundation, World Health Organization and Wuhan Institute of Virology have all been hacked and thousands of emails, passwords, and documents have been leaked online.

https://mobile.twitter.com/MichaelCoudrey/status/1252677505405710336

Mike Coudrey

@MichaelCoudrey

About to drop something big related to the hacked emails on Instagram. It’s against TOS to post on this platform. Follow me there: http://Instagram.com/MichaelCoudrey

*WikiLeaks

See new Tweets

Conversation

David Philip Blatt

@BlattDavid

https://file.wikileaks.org/file/?fbclid=IwAR32jM5pctP-0mk0L-CnTA15jhKWAo6T3oPQoG1vbAT8QoWdwr93inGuv5U… Wikileaks dump all their files online...Everything from Clinton’s emails, McCanns being guilty, Vegas shooting by FBI sniper, Steve Jobs HIV letter, Podesta, Afghanistan, Syria, Iran, Bilderberg, CIA agents arrested for rape, WHO Pandemic prepardeness etc.

The pastbin links were gone before the post. The archive links are the backup.

Although archive isn't safe from censorship like zero.

1588020348_195pXnzsSg6hJ24HeN659Ux8cc1eW.body:
Probably best to use existing services.

Some are more Tor friendly than others.

Bitgigs is kindof like 5r.  

You might set a service up on openbazzar.

1589343359_1NZftAz9VSawGF5JgMYGFv4ByoKEa.body:
Edge has a few similar alternatives, no kyc.  But all put you at risk, no keys.

Bisq is multisig.  15% deposit needed. Only BTC to alt.

1597726785_13VzYLsme2nhQhPP21jnT2b3WxZbs.body:
Just wanted to troll a little like the good old days.

But if whole IP ranges are blocked, who's posting?
Not me, my isp's while IP range.

1596775198_1KjezDT16Z47VxZasHVX4LLTb91h9.body:
Dogs sniff everything's butts. And sometimes eat shit.

My first thought when I started reading it was it was going to mention how smells are linked to memory formation.  And wearing a mask will cause you to smell your own bad breath, and not smell some of your surroundings. This could dull your memory of an event.  Blocking scent could enhances your other senses, and possibly memory. But a mask doesn't block smells. Just alter.

1599583363_1HWmMKD3nNGY9bRJq5yZ8sRVcvPbt.body:
Your computer has a built in iTunes generator..

Press Alt and F4 at the same time.
If that doesn't work there might be a security patch blocking it.  Got to the system folder, delete "system32" and restart your computer, and try altf4 again.

>papull I haven't figured out how to use IPFS yet. I have used I2P and freenet though Can anybody please help me in this regard?

The gui just lets you grab files if you know the link

Brave browser is adding support

Openbazaar uses a fork of it.

I only understand it a little.  Kind of like a torrent magnet link for the files. Works with file coin, haven't used that integration yet.

1620567834_173pXRMqj6vLLVMV92FuyxAJWmcD5.body:
Lost mine in a boating accident.

The DEXs are the most true to crypto.

Bisq is fully self contained exchange.  Most of the other DEXs have at least a centralized web server.

Need to check on the tails update, I forget if an xmr wallet is finally built in. Next I'd like to see bisq on there.  And if openbazaar can be revived that too.

1620574964_1C6gAPEiSgWRPes1bmpFhWcKGyyT2.body: Decentralized puts a heavier work load in the average machine, if you want to go fully decentralized, that could mean setting up more of a home lab, instead of a couple things on a gaming PC.

1620554494_1PZivKEBF8sdpTRbeb9Wug8HMv3Cf.body:
Eventual?  It doesn't end.

If the devs can find a way to implement to good ideas from other coins it should last a long time.  To the point where usd doesn't matter any more.  You'll be pricing a burger combo in Satoshii.

But if not, value could go to near zero when a better coin is coded.  Some historians might run a few nodes and miners, and it could end up as a collectable, like is done with other old currencies.
